describe.zh_CN: 把捣粉臼上的那把锤子拿下来（空的时候，shift+右键），它似乎可以做更多的事情，比如砸坏某些东西。\n蓄力满后，右键掉落的物品可以对物品进行敲击。
describe.en_US: Take down the hammer on the Stone Mill (when empty, shift + Right Click to take down), it seems it can do more, like smashing certain things.\nAfter fully charging, Right Click on the dropped item to Smash it.
